comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Certainly post 1885, when the second storey was added, and I imagine around 1913 when it was handed over to the NSW Government. Hence the interest for State Records. That tree (far too close to the house) should show on other early photographs. The man in uniform does not look like a Naval Officer. The tennis court might provide a clue. See - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Admiralty_House,_Sydney#The_Governo...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: You have a good eye, I didn't notice the tennis court until you pointed it out!
